title: The Mutants of 2051 A.D.
description: 2051 A.D. Ten years after World War 4. The earth had been, like, devastated by nuclear war. And today, a mutant has been spotted in the forbidden zone.
altHero: Doug McKenzie wearing a helmet and inspecting a broken model of the Statue of Liberty
alt1: Doug standing on some rocks by the water, wearing a helmet and underwear over his pants
alt3: Doug talking into a walkie talkie
alt4: Doug points a laser at a man dressed as a mutant
